name: Overcoming the Monster
description: The hero must defeat a threatening force (physical or metaphorical monster) to restore peace and order
examples: Jaws, Star Wars, Lord of the Rings

anticipation.name: Anticipation Stage
anticipation.description: The monster's presence is felt, creating fear and anticipation in the community

call_to_adventure.name: Call to Adventure
call_to_adventure.description: The hero is called upon or chooses to confront the monster

getting_out.name: Getting Out
getting_out.description: The hero begins the journey, leaving safety to face the monster

initial_fascination.name: Initial Fascination
initial_fascination.description: Early encounters reveal the monster's power, but also weaknesses

frustration.name: Frustration
frustration.description: The monster proves more dangerous than expected, setbacks occur

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description: The monster seems unbeatable, all seems lost

thrilling_escape.name: Thrilling Escape and Final Victory
thrilling_escape.description: Through courage, sacrifice, or insight, the hero defeats the monster
